text: <@U03FJQPSC0Y> do you know if this is a known issue?

Hello! :wave:
Is there a way to control HubSpot video with Javascript? I want to play it in a custom modal once thumbnail is clicked on the website.

Hey, I saw in a documentation page about chatflows that custom snippets can use the secrets api (process.env.SECRET). However, Adding a secret through the CLI doesn't make it show up in the process.env object.

I've checked the access key to the HS account, which does work
Anyone here know how I could achieve this? I don't wanna paste API keys in plain text :grimacing:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs

Is there a way to choose a different blog-listing template for tag pages? I want to use/show different modules for all tag pages ( the one with pagination)
